0:41 OH THANK GOD BLYAT

Purify Them.!


Our Lord, send forth to them a messenger of their own to recite Your revelations to them, to teach them the Scripture and Wisdom and purify them.... (129 The Heifer)


The first and foremost TASK of God's messenger is to interpret His signs. God has introduced innumerable signs into human nature as well as into the outside world to enable human beings to know their Creator.
But these signs have to be unveiled by God's Messenger : he shares his divine insight with them so that they may have a glimpse of God's glory.
' The SCRIPTURE ,' refers here to Quran..
The Second Task of the Prophet is to become a recipient of revelations from God. he has to communicate this divine message to men.
WISDOM ' here refers to insight.
When man moulds himself according to the teachings of the Quran, the light insight burns within him, producing a Sublime level of consciousness. This enables him to arrive at right conclusion in all matters as desired by God.
PURIFICATION : means to free something from unfavorable elements., it means enabling human beings to purify themselves of all negative influences resulting from their Conditioning.
The final aim of a Prophet is to fashion such souls as are totally absorbed in love for and devotion to God.
That are free from all kind of Complexes, That drive their spiritual nourishment from the world around them, something which God Himself has made available to His believing servants.

The QURAN, translation and commentary by Maulana Wahiduddin Khan
